title: Browser Integration Tutorial (Antigravity Feature)
description: Educational tutorial on how to enable Antigravity's browser integration feature. Teaches users about browser automation, web scraping, and real-time web interaction. Includes step-by-step activation guide.
author: DeepFish Core Team
educational_value: Learn how modern AI assistants interact with web browsers

usage.when_to_use: When user wants to learn about browser integration or needs web automation capabilities
examples: User: 'How do I enable browser features in Antigravity?'
User: 'I want to scrape data from websites'
User: 'Can you help me automate web tasks?'

tutorial_content.introduction: Browser integration allows AI assistants to interact with web pages, extract data, fill forms, and automate web tasks. This tutorial will teach you how this powerful feature works.
learning_objectives: Learn about web scraping ethics and best practices
Discover how AI can interact with web content
Enable browser integration in Antigravity (if available)

lessons.title: What is Browser Integration?
lessons.content: Browser integration allows AI to see and interact with web pages just like a human. It can read content, click buttons, fill forms, and extract data.

lessons.title: Use Cases
lessons.content: Common uses: web scraping, form automation, data extraction, testing, monitoring, research assistance.

lessons.title: Ethical Considerations
lessons.content: Always respect robots.txt, terms of service, rate limits, and privacy. Use browser automation responsibly.

lessons.title: Enabling Browser Integration
lessons.content: Step-by-step guide to enable browser features in Antigravity (if supported by your subscription).
activation_steps: Test with a simple web task

activation_guide.disclaimer: Browser integration availability depends on your Antigravity subscription tier and regional settings. This tutorial provides educational content about the feature.

steps.title: Check Subscription
steps.description: Verify your Antigravity subscription includes browser integration
steps.action: Go to Settings â†’ Subscription â†’ Features

steps.title: Enable Feature
steps.action: Settings â†’ Features â†’ Browser Integration â†’ Enable

steps.title: Grant Permissions
steps.description: Allow Antigravity to interact with browser
steps.action: Accept permission prompts when they appear

steps.title: Test Integration
steps.description: Try a simple web task to verify it works
steps.action: Ask Antigravity to 'Read the title of google.com'

beginner: Read the title of a webpage
Extract text from a specific element
Check if a website is online

pricing_model.note: Actual browser integration feature availability depends on Antigravity subscription, not DeepFish

legal_disclaimer: This tutorial is for educational purposes. Browser integration is an Antigravity feature, not a DeepFish feature. Availability depends on your Antigravity subscription tier. DeepFish provides educational content about how to use this feature if available.

marketing_copy.description: Comprehensive tutorial on browser integration for AI assistants. Learn concepts, best practices, and activation steps.
marketing_copy.value_proposition: Master browser automation and unlock powerful web interaction capabilities for your AI assistant.

notes: This is an educational skill that teaches users about browser integration. The 'activation' is really just showing them where the toggle is in Antigravity settings (if it exists). We're providing value through education and guidance, not actually enabling a feature we don't control. It's a tutorial, not a hack! ðŸ˜‡
